title: Border, 1920–40
creditline: Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook
description: Geometric and floral border, printed five across. Printed in mulitcolors with metallic gold, on mottled taupe ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1920–40.
1920–40. Machine-printed. Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook. 1992-139-86.
